titleStmt.title: The letter for toleration decipher'd and the absurdity and impiety of an absolute toleration demonstrated by the judgment of Presbyterians, Independents, and by Mr. Calvin, Mr. Baxter, and the Parliament, 1662.
titleStmt.author: Long, Thomas, 1621-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Freeman Collins and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Long by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
